CytoCAD Changelog


Release Summary:


Version 1.0.3 - Oct 8, 2021
    * Changed coverage plot y axis to copy number


Version 1.0.2 - Sept 8, 2021
    * Add ruptures in Bioconda recipe
    
    
Version 1.0.1 - Sept 1, 2021
    * Scaled genomic coverage to fix high coverage bug
    * Extended chr Y end filter region


Version 1.0.0 - May 29, 2021
    * Initial release
